name: Desi Ipsum
description:
Plugin to generate placeholder text in Indian languages.

Create blocks of randomly generated text and add them to your canvas. Select all the text layers you want to add text to and click 'Generate'. Every click of the 'Generate' button creates a fresh block of text.


What is Desi?

'Desi' is a word derived from Sanskrit 'Desa/Desam' (देश/देशम्) which means country, nation. It is generally used to describe the people, culture, languages, festivals, and products of Indian origin.


Currently supports 11 languages

  1. Hindi
  2. Marathi
  3. Sanskrit
  4. Tamil
  5. Kannada
  6. Telugu
  7. Malayalam
  8. Gujarati
  9. Bangla
  10. Odia
  11. Punjabi


Features

  • Generates requested number of words
  • A sentence contains 4-9 words
  • A paragraph contains 3-7 sentences
  • Language-specific punctuation marks


Workflow

  1. Run plugin
  2. Select one or more text layers where you want to add generated text
  3. Enter the number and select type of text blocks such as Words, Sentences, or Paragraphs
  4. Select the language from the dropdown list
  5. Click on 'Generate' to add 'Desi Ipsum' text to your canvas
